title: 'Anichess' NFT Game Launches With Backing From World Chess Champ Magnus Carlsen - Decrypt
image_alt: Gaming NFT Polygon Animoca Brands Chess video games Anichess Chess.com Mocaverse Magnus Carlsen
description: After raising $1.5 million last year, Anichess is now playable with support from Chess.com and vaunted chess grandmaster Magnus Carlsen.
